section.paragraph: Denial of Service attacks have many harmful impacts, particularly for larger companies who receive negative publicity if their services are not available for some time. They can also lose moeny as a result of potential customers not being able to access their resources. Attempting to overcome and fix DOS attacks can be a strain on resources, as companies waste time and money when their IT staff have to help them to recover.

eSports is also frequently and majorly affected. Unlike casual gaming, where the servers are normally not possible to take down, many eSports event have competitors competing over their home Internet connections. Amateur and semi-professional scenes suffer frequently from competitors disconnecting and it widely accepted (although rarely proven) to be as a result of DOS attacks.
Though this is not a problem at fully professional levels (due to competitions taking place over LANs), this is increasingly affecting the validity of lower-tier leagues.
